document.topic_text: To: RedWulf A thousand LOLs!!!! to you! 12 posted on 04/25/2016 11:29:19 AM PDT by miss marmelstein (Richard the Third: With my own people alone I should like to drive away the Turks (Muslims)) [ Post Reply | Private Reply | To 4 | View Replies ] To: Sybeck1 Well, Kasich is doing the same in Indiana, so it’s now a mutual dis-admiration society that’s doomed to fail. 13 posted on 04/25/2016 11:29:20 AM PDT by alancarp (There are not enough laxatives in the world to cure that what ails Democrats.) To: Sybeck1 Cruz responded: Listen, I dont doubt that Donald Trump is going to scream and yell and curse and insult and probably cry and whine some as well, that has been Donalds pattern. Now I recognize everyone got all excited because last week Donald won his home state. 14 posted on 04/25/2016 11:29:25 AM PDT by TTFX To: Sybeck1 No, no, it's not a double cross, it's a Carson. Next thing you know he'll be in the closet with Kasich trying to work things out by saying he didn't know a thing about this. 15 posted on 04/25/2016 11:30:10 AM PDT by Rashputin (Jesus Christ doesn't evacuate His troops, He leads them to victory !!) [ Post Reply | Private Reply | To 1 | View Replies ] To: Sybeck1 I’m sure there’s someone, somewhere, stupid enough to believe this. Probably related to the person that was stupid enough to think people would believe this. 16 posted on 04/25/2016 11:30:23 AM PDT by Darth Reardon (Would I lie to you?) To: TTFX Y R U all putting it on Cruz and not Kasich? 17 posted on 04/25/2016 11:30:29 AM PDT by DIRTYSECRET (urope. Why do they put up with this.) [ Post Reply | Private Reply | To 14 | View Replies ] To: Sybeck1 18 posted on 04/25/2016 11:30:41 AM PDT by KentTrappedInLiberalSeattle ("The bathroom deal is a big fat nothing burger." -- Jim Robinson, 04/22/16)
